verses.verse: Thou shalt not see <WH7200> <WH8799> thy brother's <WH251> ox <WH7794> or his sheep <WH7716> go astray <WH5080> <WH8737>, and hide <WH5956> <WH8694> thyself from them: thou shalt in any case <WH7725> <WH8687> bring them again <WH7725> <WH8686> unto thy brother <WH251>.

And if thy brother <WH251> be not nigh <WH7138> unto thee, or if thou know <WH3045> <WH8804> him not, then thou shalt bring <WH622> <WH8804> it unto <WH8432> thine own house <WH1004>, and it shall be with thee until thy brother <WH251> seek <WH1875> <WH8800> after it, and thou shalt restore it to him again <WH7725> <WH8689>.

In like manner <WH3651> shalt thou do <WH6213> <WH8799> with his ass <WH2543>; and so shalt thou do <WH6213> <WH8799> with his raiment <WH8071>; and with all lost thing <WH9> of thy brother's <WH251>, which he hath lost <WH6> <WH8799>, and thou hast found <WH4672> <WH8804>, shalt thou do <WH6213> <WH8799> likewise: thou mayest <WH3201> <WH8799> not hide <WH5956> <WH8692> thyself.

Thou shalt not see <WH7200> <WH8799> thy brother's <WH251> ass <WH2543> or his ox <WH7794> fall down <WH5307> <WH8802> by the way <WH1870>, and hide <WH5956> <WH8694> thyself from them: thou shalt surely <WH6965> <WH8687> help him to lift them up again <WH6965> <WH8686>.

The woman <WH802> shall not wear that which pertaineth <WH3627> unto a man <WH1397>, neither shall a man <WH1397> put <WH3847> <WH8799> on a woman's <WH802> garment <WH8071>: for all that do <WH6213> <WH8802> so <WH428> are abomination <WH8441> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

If a bird's <WH6833> nest <WH7064> chance <WH7122> <WH8735> to be before <WH6440> thee in the way <WH1870> in any tree <WH6086>, or on the ground <WH776>, whether they be young ones <WH667>, or eggs <WH1000>, and the dam <WH517> sitting <WH7257> <WH8802> upon the young <WH667>, or upon the eggs <WH1000>, thou shalt not take <WH3947> <WH8799> the dam <WH517> with the young <WH1121>:

But thou shalt in any wise <WH7971> <WH8763> let the dam <WH517> go <WH7971> <WH8762>, and take <WH3947> <WH8799> the young <WH1121> to thee; that it may be well <WH3190> <WH8799> with thee, and that thou mayest prolong <WH748> <WH8689> thy days <WH3117>.

When thou buildest <WH1129> <WH8799> a new <WH2319> house <WH1004>, then thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> a battlement <WH4624> for thy roof <WH1406>, that thou bring <WH7760> <WH8799> not blood <WH1818> upon thine house <WH1004>, if any man <WH5307> <WH8802> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> from thence.

Thou shalt not sow <WH2232> <WH8799> thy vineyard <WH3754> with divers seeds <WH3610>: lest the fruit <WH4395> of thy seed <WH2233> which thou hast sown <WH2232> <WH8799>, and the fruit <WH8393> of thy vineyard <WH3754>, be defiled <WH6942> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt not plow <WH2790> <WH8799> with an ox <WH7794> and an ass <WH2543> together <WH3162>.
Thou shalt not wear <WH3847> <WH8799> a garment of divers sorts <WH8162>, as of woollen <WH6785> and linen <WH6593> together <WH3162>.
Thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> thee fringes <WH1434> upon the four <WH702> quarters <WH3671> of thy vesture <WH3682>, wherewith thou coverest <WH3680> <WH8762> thyself.
If any man <WH376> take <WH3947> <WH8799> a wife <WH802>, and go in <WH935> <WH8804> unto her, and hate <WH8130> <WH8804> her,

And give <WH7760> <WH8804> occasions <WH5949> of speech <WH1697> against her, and bring up <WH3318> <WH8689> an evil <WH7451> name <WH8034> upon her, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, I took <WH3947> <WH8804> this woman <WH802>, and when I came <WH7126> <WH8799> to her, I found <WH4672> <WH8804> her not a maid <WH1331>:

Then shall the father <WH1> of the damsel <WH5291>, and her mother <WH517>, take <WH3947> <WH8804> and bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> the tokens of the damsel's <WH5291> virginity <WH1331> unto the elders <WH2205> of the city <WH5892> in the gate <WH8179>:

And the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1> shall say <WH559> <WH8804> unto the elders <WH2205>, I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> my daughter <WH1323> unto this man <WH376> to wife <WH802>, and he hateth <WH8130> <WH8799> her;

And, lo, he hath given <WH7760> <WH8804> occasions <WH5949> of speech <WH1697> against her, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I found <WH4672> <WH8804> not thy daughter <WH1323> a maid <WH1331>; and yet these are the tokens of my daughter's <WH1323> virginity <WH1331>. And they shall spread <WH6566> <WH8804> the cloth <WH8071> before <WH6440> the elders <WH2205> of the city <WH5892>.
And the elders <WH2205> of that city <WH5892> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> that man <WH376> and chastise <WH3256> <WH8765> him;

And they shall amerce <WH6064> <WH8804> him in an hundred <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701>, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> them unto the father <WH1> of the damsel <WH5291>, because he hath brought up <WH3318> <WH8689> an evil <WH7451> name <WH8034> upon a virgin <WH1330> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and she shall be his wife <WH802>; he may <WH3201> <WH8799> not put her away <WH7971> <WH8763> all his days <WH3117>.
But if this thing <WH1697> be true <WH571>, and the tokens of virginity <WH1331> be not found <WH4672> <WH8738> for the damsel <WH5291>:

Then they shall bring out <WH3318> <WH8689> the damsel <WH5291> to the door <WH6607> of her father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, and the men <WH582> of her city <WH5892> shall stone <WH5619> <WH8804> her with stones <WH68> that she die <WH4191> <WH8804>: because she hath wrought <WH6213> <WH8804> folly <WH5039> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to play the whore <WH2181> <WH8800> in her father's <WH1> house <WH1004>: so shalt thou put <WH1197> evil <WH7451> away <WH1197> <WH8765> from among <WH7130> you.

If a man <WH376> be found <WH4672> <WH8735> lying <WH7901> <WH8802> with a woman <WH802> married <WH1166> <WH8803> to an husband <WH1167>, then they shall both of them <WH8147> die <WH4191> <WH8804>, both the man <WH376> that lay <WH7901> <WH8802> with the woman <WH802>, and the woman <WH802>: so shalt thou put away <WH1197> <WH8765> evil <WH7451> from Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

If a damsel <WH5291> that is a virgin <WH1330> be betrothed <WH781> <WH8794> unto an husband <WH376>, and a man <WH376> find <WH4672> <WH8804> her in the city <WH5892>, and lie <WH7901> <WH8804> with her;

Then ye shall bring <WH3318> <WH8689> them both <WH8147> out unto the gate <WH8179> of that city <WH5892>, and ye shall stone <WH5619> <WH8804> them with stones <WH68> that they die <WH4191> <WH8804>; the damsel <WH5291>, because <WH834> <WH1697> she cried <WH6817> <WH8804> not, being in the city <WH5892>; and the man <WH376>, because <WH834> <WH1697> he hath humbled <WH6031> <WH8765> his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>: so thou shalt put away <WH1197> <WH8765> evil <WH7451> from among <WH7130> you.

But if a man <WH376> find <WH4672> <WH8799> a betrothed <WH781> <WH8794> damsel <WH5291> in the field <WH7704>, and the man <WH376> force <WH2388> <WH8689> her, and lie <WH7901> <WH8804> with her: then the man <WH376> only that lay <WH7901> <WH8804> with her shall die <WH4191> <WH8804>:

But unto the damsel <WH5291> thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799> nothing <WH1697>; there is in the damsel <WH5291> no sin <WH2399> worthy of death <WH4194>: for as when a man <WH376> riseht <WH6965> <WH8799> against his neighbour <WH7453>, and slayeth <WH7523> <WH8804> <WH8676> <WH5315> him, even so is this matter <WH1697>:
For he found <WH4672> <WH8804> her in the field <WH7704>, and the betrothed <WH781> <WH8794> damsel <WH5291> cried <WH6817> <WH8804>, and there was none to save <WH3467> <WH8688> her.

If a man <WH376> find <WH4672> <WH8799> a damsel <WH5291> that is a virgin <WH1330>, which is not betrothed <WH781> <WH8795>, and lay hold <WH8610> <WH8804> on her, and lie <WH7901> <WH8804> with her, and they be found <WH4672> <WH8738>;

Then the man <WH376> that lay <WH7901> <WH8802> with her shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1> fifty <WH2572> shekels of silver <WH3701>, and she shall be his wife <WH802>; because he hath humbled <WH6031> <WH8765> her, he may <WH3201> <WH8799> not put her away <WH7971> <WH8763> all his days <WH3117>.
A man <WH376> shall not take <WH3947> <WH8799> his father's <WH1> wife <WH802>, nor discover <WH1540> <WH8762> his father's <WH1> skirt <WH3671>.
